pullrequest.title: update VRC3 firehose threading task environment.

content.raw:
Another day, another significant change to the objects. On behalf of my team, please finish these models as soon as possible. These changes make things very difficult for us!

While I'm at it the current standpipe doesn't give lidar returns on its flat faces:

![http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013may/standpipe_lidar.png](http://people.csail.mit.edu/mfallon/share/2013may/standpipe_lidar.png)
